news.title: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B

news.title: Hacking conference Def Con bans three people linked to Epstein
news.summary: The Def Con hacking conference banned hackers Pablos Holman and Vincenzo Iozzo, as well as former MIT Media Lab director Joichi Ito, from attending the annual conference after their reported connections with Jeffrey Epstein.
